verses.verse: I lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869> again, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and behold a man <WH376> with a measuring <WH4060> line <WH2256> in his hand <WH3027>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, Whither goest <WH1980> <WH8802> thou? And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, To measure <WH4058> <WH8800> Yerushalayim <WH3389>, to see <WH7200> <WH8800> what <WH4100> is the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and what is the length <WH753> thereof.
And, behold, the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me went forth <WH3318> <WH8802>, and another <WH312> angel <WH4397> went out <WH3318> <WH8802> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> him,

And said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Run <WH7323> <WH8798>, speak <WH1696> <WH8761> to this <WH1975> young man <WH5288>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall be inhabited <WH3427> <WH8799> as towns without walls <WH6519> for the multitude <WH7230> of men <WH120> and cattle <WH929> therein <WH8432>:
For I, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, will be unto her a wall <WH2346> of fire <WH784> round about <WH5439>, and will be the glory <WH3519> in the midst <WH8432> of her.

Ho <WH1945>, ho <WH1945>, come forth, and flee <WH5127> <WH8798> from the land <WH776> of the north <WH6828>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>: for I have spread you abroad <WH6566> <WH8765> as the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of the heaven <WH8064>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.
Deliver <WH4422> <WH8734> thyself, O <WH1945> TZiyon <WH6726>, that dwellest <WH3427> <WH8802> with the daughter <WH1323> of Babylon <WH894>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; After <WH310> the glory <WH3519> hath he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto the nations <WH1471> which spoiled <WH7997> <WH8802> you: for he that toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> you toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> the apple <WH892> of his eye <WH5869>.

For, behold, I will shake <WH5130> <WH8688> mine hand <WH3027> upon them, and they shall be a spoil <WH7998> to their servants <WH5647> <WH8802>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me.

Sing <WH7442> <WH8798> and rejoice <WH8055> <WH8798>, O daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>: for, lo, I come <WH935> <WH8802>, and I will dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> shall be joined <WH3867> <WH8738> to the YY <WH3068> in that day <WH3117>, and shall be my people <WH5971>: and I will dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto thee.
And the YY <WH3068> shall inherit <WH5157> <WH8804> Y'hudah <WH3063> his portion <WH2506> in the holy <WH6944> land <WH127>, and shall choose <WH977> <WH8804> Yerushalayim <WH3389> again.
Be silent <WH2013> <WH8761>, O all flesh <WH1320>, before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: for he is raised up <WH5782> <WH8738> out of his holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>.
